info.name: Reduce glow around urlbar (awesome bar) in OS X.
info.description: Reduce the ugly glow around the Awesome Bar in Firefox. Designed for Firefox in OS X. (blue colour sampled from El Capitan GUI).
info.additionalInfo:
You can change color of the glow, and its size by editing the file.

I recommend enable the search in the Awesome Bar (in Firefox preferences) and remove the Search Bar from toolbar. (click customize button in hamburger menu and pull down search bar from the toolbar)
